name: Major Minor 2.0: (Re)Vision
storyline: A mysterious wave of serial murders have begun to hit Tokyo, with crime scenes defying explanation. As one of the "Lucky Two", you've beaten the odds, and won a contest that grants you a luxurious spot in a pop idol's world tour; promising the adventure of a lifetime. With Tokyo as your first stop, however, events quickly escalate. You'll soon become an important figure in a struggle that spans multiple worlds, and their puzzling connection. You may not only be the key to solving these mysterious murders - but you may hold the fate of all existence in your hands as well. Enjoy your adventure, and choose wisely...
summary: Become intertwined in the fateful connection plaguing two worlds, bound together by a murder mystery, and a competition for the throne of a god. The award-winning visual novel, completely revamped! New script, new choices, and romance! Become The Savior today, and choose wisely...
